Class Router

java.lang.Object
Devices.Device
Devices.Router
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceWithCLI
public class Router extends Device implements DeviceWithCLI
Represents a Router capable of static IP allocation, port IP assignments, and VLAN interface configuration. Also supports CLI-based IP helper setup and routing table management.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Izzy Kavanagh

    • configureVLANInterface

      public void configureVLANInterface(int vlanId, String ipAddress)
      Configures a VLAN interface with a specific VLAN ID and IP address.

      This method creates a new VLANInterface instance and associates it with the provided VLAN ID and IP address. It then stores the VLAN interface in a map for further use. The configuration is confirmed with a printed message.

      Parameters:
      vlanId - the VLAN ID for which the interface is to be configured.
      ipAddress - the IP address to assign to the VLAN interface.

    • showVLANInterfaces

      public void showVLANInterfaces()
      Displays all configured VLAN interfaces.

    • getVLANInterfaces

      public Map<Integer,VLANInterface> getVLANInterfaces()
      Returns the VLAN interface configurations.
      Returns:
      the VLAN interfaces map

    • printAllocations

      public void printAllocations()
      Displays the current static IP allocations.
